name: TELEMETRY
description:
TELEMETRY is an endless space game based on real-world physics. Control your ship's speed to navigate an endless solar system using the gravitational forces of near by planets. Maneuver into perfect orbits to rack up a high score, just  be careful not to crash and burn!

This game is HARD...  You have been warned!

Thanks so much for checking out my game, I really hope you enjoy it!
